snippet.title: Serena Teaser
snippet.description:
How long has it been? A man sits in a distant getaway cabin waiting for his wife Serena. Where is she? Things in the cabin evoke memories, and the husband comes to a disturbing realization...

This short point-and-click adventure is the result of a massive collaborative effort between dozens of fans and designers of adventure games.

Now available on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/272060/

More info at: http://WaitingForSerena.com
